summary: I made a little mod in the ebony sword texture
descriptionHtml: Hallo guys, this is my very first mod, this was quite hardy to make due to my intermediate english but it\'s done now. I change the poor gray metal tone for an intense black one, also i put 100% of light in the small golden figures to give more detail. It was only for myself cause this game has low resolution textures, meshes, etc. Hope you like it guys, sincerely.
author: wotecorix
